author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Elden Ring Nightreign's network tests have had a rough start. Players trying to get into the multiplayer-centric spinoff weren't able to in some cases. The issues were so bad that developer FromSoftware may extend the window that the tests will be available. In other news, IGN had an extensive interview with the creators of Okami 2, confirming that yes, this is a direct sequel to the PS2-era Okami, and dropping some other juicy bits of info as well. And finally, Astro Bot continues to win bit at awards shows, taking home some big ones at last night's DICE Awards. And there's more Astro Bot coming, with a new level available now, and more on the way.
title: Elden Ring: Nightreign's Server Issues Won't Stop More Bosses and DLC - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
SPOILER WARNING! Now that we’ve gotten a look at Captain America: Brave New World in its entirety, we’ve got some big questions about how the movie affects the MCU going forward. Now that Marvel is back to its three movies a year pace, did its 2025 slate get off to a good enough start? With the WTF thoughts we’re having about Harrison Ford’s Thaddeus Red Hulk Ross, The Leader’s scheming, the introduction of Adamantium and a host of side characters thrown into the mix, they might have stumbled out of the gate again.

#IGN #Marvel #MCU
title: Captain America: Brave New World | Our Biggest WTF Questions

author: IGN
description:
Check out this Disney's Snow White teaser trailer for this upcoming live-action musical reimagining of the studio’s classic 1937 film. Disney's Snow White stars Rachel Zegler (“West Side Story”) as Snow White and Gal Gadot (“Wonder Woman”) as her Stepmother, the Evil Queen.

From the producer and executive producer of “Wicked,” Marc Platt and Jared LeBoff, and director Marc Webb (“The Amazing Spider-Man”) comes Disney’s Snow White. Journey to the whimsical world in this first trailer for Disney's Snow White, and meet iconic characters Bashful, Doc, Dopey, Grumpy, Happy, Sleepy, and Sneezy. The trailer also features the power ballad 'Waiting on a Wish,' one of the all-new original songs from EGOT winners Benj Pasek and Justin Paul (“The Greatest Showman”).

Disney's Snow White opens in theaters on March 21, 2025.

#SnowWhite #Disney #Movies
title: Disney’s Snow White - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Rachel Zegler, Gal Gadot

author: IGN
description:
Cardy, Matt, and Jesse are here to talk through a few of the highlights from this week's PlayStation State of Play. They take a look at the exciting-looking neo-medieval London action of Tides of Annihilation, the sleekness of Housemarque's Returnal successor, Saros, and the continued weirdness of Hell is Us. Plus, there are also reviews of Obsidian's new fantasy RPG, Avowed, and the latest MCU entry Captain America: Brave New World. Happy Valentine's Day!






Remember to send us your thoughts about all the new games, TV shows, and films you're enjoying or looking forward to: ign_ukfeedback@ign.com.


 


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices (https://megaphone.fm/adchoices)
title: IGN UK Podcast 787: Are We Wowed by Avowed?

author: IGN
description: Check out this new cinematic trailer for Mecharashi, the upcoming sci-fi strategy role-playing game that includes plenty of mech-to-mech combat. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3446920/Mecharashi/
title: Mecharashi - Official Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Marvel Studios’ Captain America: Brave New World is playing now in theaters. Watch the latest Captain America: Brave New World teaser trailer for another look at this MCU film starring Anthony Mackie, Harrison Ford, Danny Ramirez, Shira Haas, Carl Lumbly, Xosha Roquemore, with Giancarlo Esposito, Liv Tyler, and Tim Blake Nelson.

In Captain America: Brave New World, Sam finds himself in the middle of an international incident after meeting with newly elected U.S. President Thaddeus Ross. He must discover the reason behind a nefarious global plot before the true mastermind has the entire world seeing red.

The film is directed by Julius Onah and produced by Kevin Feige and Nate Moore. Louis D’Esposito and Charles Newirth serve as executive producers. The screenplay is by Rob Edwards and Malcolm Spellman & Dalan Musso and Julius Onah & Peter Glanz, with story by Rob Edwards and Malcolm Spellman & Dalan Musson.

#CaptainAmerica #Marvel #Movies
title: Captain America: Brave New World - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Anthony Mackie, Harrison Ford

author: IGN
description:
Celebrate Valentine's Day with this new Elden Ring Nightreign trailer. Watch the latest Elden Ring Nightreign trailer for this standalone cooperative spin-off set in a world parallel to that of 2022’s Elden Ring. Leave your loneliness at the door and explore Limveld with your two life partners (or new friends!) – where nothing says “I love you” like taking the Centipede Demon as a team. Elden Ring Nightreign launches on PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox, and Steam on May 30, 2025.

#EldenRing #EldenRingNightreign #Gaming
title: Elden Ring Nightreign - Official 'Happy Valentine's Day' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Okami 2 developers discuss the surprise Okami Sequel and talk about Okami's legacy! IGN exclusively sits down with developers from Capcom and Clovers to talk about how the legacy of Okami is influencing the recently announced sequel. Learn about how modern technology may lead to differences in Okami 2 gameplay in Hideki Kamiya's continuation of Amaterasu's story.

#Okami #Gaming #IGN
title: "Trust Us" - Okami 2 Developers on the Surprise Sequel and Okami's Legacy

author: IGN
description:
Goddess of Victory: Nikke is getting a new collaboration with the iconic anime Evangelion franchise beginning February 20, 2025. Watch the Goddess of Victory: Nikke x Evangelion trailer to see what to expect with this second collaboration, which features a special storyline set in the world of Evangelion as well as characters like Asuka: WILLE, Rei Ayanami (Tentative Name), and Sakura (Toji’s sister) to the sci-fi RPG shooter game. Asuka Shikinami Langley, Rei Ayanami, and Mari Makinami Illustrious will also return, giving you another chance to obtain them. The new collaboration will also feature exclusive character outfits (including free skins), a 3D event map, and a new mini-game.

#Evangelion #Gaming #Anime
title: Goddess of Victory: Nikke x Evangelion - Official 2nd Collaboration Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! This week, Daemon, Max, and Ryan look back at the three major showcases from the three major console manufacturers. Sony recently had their State of Play, showing off a few high-profile titles like the Housemarque's Saros and Tides of Annihilation. Xbox also aired the recent edition of Developer Direct, highlighting first-party games South of Midnight, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, Doom: The Dark Ages, and the surprise Ninja Gaiden 4. Of course, Nintendo had to get in on the action with the first official reveal of the Nintendo Switch 2. What made the bigger splash? Plus we have last week's poll results, and a new poll for you to go over at IGN.com.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Sony vs Xbox vs Nintendo: Who Had the Best Early 2025 Show? - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description: Enjoy this 11-minute extended gameplay walkthrough of Tides of Annihilation, the fantasy-action game just announced at the Sony State of Play that's inspired by the legend of King Arthur and set in London following an Outworld invasion. This gameplay video showcases our heroine Gwendolyn and her companion Ninian as they search for fragments of the Holy Grail. They'll eventually face off against a boss named Mordred. Tides of Annihilation is in development for PC and consoles.
title: Tides of Annihilation - Extended Gameplay Walkthrough

author: IGN
description:
Subscribe to IGN for more!
http://www.youtube.com/user/IGNentertainment?sub_confirmation=1

#IGN
title: Tides of Annihilation gameplay looks ️‍🔥️‍🔥

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Avowed launch trailer to see the threats you'll face and learn more about this world from this RPG. Avowed is available to play now with Early Access, and it will be available on February 18, 2025 on PC, Xbox Game Pass, and Xbox Series X/S.

Welcome to the Living Lands, a wild and untamed frontier where exiles, dreamers, and adventurers seek a new beginning. But beneath its breathtaking landscapes, something sinister festers. A devastating soul-plague known as the Dreamscourge is driving settlers to madness, and the land itself resists those who try to tame it. As an Envoy chosen by a foreign emperor and blessed by a mysterious god, you are thrust into the heart of this chaos. With divine power at your fingertips, you’ll uncover ancient secrets, forge uneasy alliances, and determine the fate of a world on the brink. Will you bring unity to the Living Lands or let its struggles consume it?
title: Avowed - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: BORDERLINE is an edge-of-your-seat thriller that follows a dangerously persistent stalker (Nicholson) who invades the home of a ‘90s pop superstar (Weaving) with grand delusions of a wedding. With her life on the line and help from her loyal bodyguard, she must escape the stalker’s sinister grip before they tie the knot.
title: Borderline - Official Trailer (2025) Samara Weaving, Ray Nicholson, Alba Baptista

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Release Date Trailer for Glover, a 90's cult classic 3D platformer developed by QUByte Interactive. Players will once again take control of a magical glove on a quest to restore balance to the kingdom just as players did on the Nintendo 64. Manipulate a magic ball to solve puzzles, overcome challenges, and defeat the evil glove counterpart after being separated from a powerful magic Wizard. Glover is launching on February 27 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Glover - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description: Before they created Super Mario Galaxy, Nintendo’s Tokyo studio made one of the strangest Donkey Kong games of all time. Donkey Kong Jungle Beat let players control DK with actual bongo drums, and despite its bizarre concept, it was a surprisingly fun and innovative platformer. But why hasn’t Nintendo EPD made a Donkey Kong game since? The NVC crew revisits this oddball classic on its 20th anniversary.
title: 20 Years Ago, Nintendo Released One of Its Weirdest Games Ever - NVC Clips

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Launch Trailer for Rugby 25, an arcade rugby sports game developed by Big Ant Studios. Players will compete on a variety of fields from local clubs to international championships for the glory and the win. Use tactical decisions on the field to engage with over 140 international teams, 150 clubs from 11 major competitions, and more in the most authentic rugby video game to date. Rugby 25 is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: Rugby 25 - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: The film is an all-new story featuring both original characters and the beloved virtual singers from the game. The story follows Hoshino Ichika, a high school musician who encounters a version of Hatsune Miku who is not able to sing, and asks for help to reach others through her music. In addition to the original characters to the film, the movie also features the main cast and Virtual Singer performers of the original game, with the voice cast of the original game returning to their respective roles for the film.
title: Colorful Stage! The Movie: A Miku Who Can't Sing - Official Teaser Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
title: We gave Captain America: Brave New World a 5 out of 10, which means "Mediocre." #ign #movie #reivew

author: IGN
title: In Elden Ring Nightreign, you can sprint faster than you could in Elden Ring! #eldenring #nightreign

author: IGN
description: Set in a post-apocalyptic future, O'dessa is an original rock opera about a farm gl on an epic quest to recover a cherished family heirloom. Her Journey leads her to a strange and dangerous city where she meets her one true love - but in order to save his soul, she must put the power of destiny and song to the ultimate test.
title: O'DESSA - Official Trailer (2025) Sadie Sink, Kelvin Harrison Jr., Regina Hall

author: IGN
description:
Here's how to find all Woedica God Totem Fragments in Avowed to complete the Scales of the Oathbinder, including where to purchase the Totem of Rightful Rulership clues and what passive buff each Totem Fragment provides.

Once you find all six Woedica God Totem Fragments and Scales of the Oathbinder base, head to a Party Camp to place the Totem Core on the Totem Shrine. After placing the base, you'll be able to add Totem fragments to gain passive buffs. Only one Totem can be activated at a time.

0:00 Intro
0:07 Where to Find Sanza's Clues
0:49 Scales of the Oathbinder (Totem Core)
1:30 Broken Crown Jewel
2:08 Golden Scale of Order
3:43 Golden Scale of Justice
4:46 Golden Plaque of Oaths
5:35 Golden Plaque of Promises
6:31 Golden Flames
title: Avowed - All Dawnshore God Totem Fragment Locations (Scales of the Oathbinder)
